analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika āsava vippayutta sa āsava duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayutta

original: sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: sa āsavam dhammam paccayā na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca dhammā
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa asavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa asavaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayuttam anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayutta

original: anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo
analyzed: anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham āsava vippayuttam anāsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā
cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
